translation: The topic for my presentation today is Designing the Future.
transcript: 那今天我想讲的一个题目呢是设计未来。

translation: Why do we call it Designing the Future?
transcript: 那为什么叫设计未来呢？

translation: Because today we are talking about education, and education is about the future.
transcript: 因为今天我们讲的主题，是教育，教育是关乎未来的。

translation: Well, my previous career actually had a lot of annotations.
transcript: 呃我的以前的职业生涯，呃其实有很多的注解。

translation: Between 1998 and 2009, a period lasting for 10 years, I was an architect.
transcript: 那差不多在98年到2009年这个十年期间呢，我基本上是一个建筑师。

translation: I built nearly 400,000 square meters of public buildings during this period of time.
transcript: 也就在这段时间里面，我差不多建成了40万平方米的公共建筑。

translation: Even in Tongji University, a higher education institution well known for its architecture discipline.
transcript: 即便在同济，以建筑出名的学校。

translation: I might have been a relatively productive architect compared to my peers.
transcript: 我可能也算是一个比较高产的建筑师。

translation: But when your career is moving to a certain stage, you're certain to encounter a lot of problems.
transcript: 但是呢就说，每个人的职业生涯在推进到一定阶段的时候，你肯定会有很多的问题。

translation: Between 2003 and 2005, I began to reflect on my own work.
transcript: 那差不多在2003年，04年，05年这段时间，我就开始在反思我自己的工作。

translation: I've designed quite a few schools.
transcript: 我设计了非常多的学校。

translation: This school was built in 2004, and it is about 14 to 15 years old now.
transcript: 那这个学校呢，2004年的时候建成的，那现在一算也差不多十四五年了。

translation: When the school was first put into use, everyone was telling me, “This school has been beautifully designed, it is like a garden.”
transcript: 呃这个学校建成之后呢，大家都在说，哦这个学校做得真好，像个花园。

translation: The school was actually located at the outskirt area of a city.
transcript: 那这个学校实际上是在这个城市的郊区，是边缘。

translation: Prior to the development of a new zone, a city will normally set up schools over there.
transcript: 呃城市在新区拓展的时候，往往把学校先搬过去。

translation: I kept thinking these questions in my mind, “Is it good or bad for designing a garden-like school? What can I do as an architect?”
transcript: 那当时我就在想，学校像一个花园，它到底是一个好事，还是个坏事？作为一个建筑师我到底能做什么？

translation: I came to realize that, as an architect myself, I could do very little about it.
transcript: 我自己反思的一个结果是，作为一个建筑师，我其实做的东西非常非常的有限。

translation: Schools like this one are far away from the city center.
transcript: 因为像这样的学校，它远离城市中心。

translation: Basically all of the students’ lives, their studies and social activities are taking place within this school, a school surrounded by walls.
transcript: 基本上学生的所有的生活，他的学习，他的社交，基本上都在这个学校里面，都在这个围墙里面。

translation: You know, when you have stayed inside the walls for a long enough time, you will gradually lost your ability to adapt to the life outside the walls.
transcript: 要知道在墙里的时间多了，那你慢慢慢慢就不太适应墙外的生活。

translation: It is the same for a city.
transcript: 对一座城市来讲。

translation: If too many stories are kept inside the walls, and the city will have much less stories to tell.
transcript: 如果把太多的故事，圈在围墙里面，那么这座城市，它的故事就会少很多很多。

translation: Starting from 2007, I made up my mind that instead of spending most of my time in building the shell, I mean the buildings as a form of material space structure, why not to do something related to content?
transcript: 07年开始呢，我就觉得，哎可能与其去做这个躯壳，做这个物质空间层面的这个建筑，可能还不如呢再去做一点内容。

translation: And from that time I started focusing most of my energy on the development of College of Design and Innovation of Tongji University, which was originally a department and later became a college.
transcript: 所以差不多从那时候开始呢，我就开始呢，把几乎把我自己所有的精力呢，都投在怎么来去把自己所在的这个原来是系，后面变成一个学院，能够把它做得最好。

translation: In line of this year’s Chris Ranking, our college is the highest-ranked design institute in Asia.
transcript: 那按照今年的chris ranking，那我们是在亚洲排名最高的设计学院。

translation: We have the highest ranking among all disciplines and higher education institutions in Shanghai, and we rank the 18th in the world.
transcript: 也是上海所有的大学和所有的学科里面，我们是排名最高的，在全世界排18位。

translation: However, there is something far more important than the ranking itself.
transcript: 那除了排名以外比排名更重要的是。

translation: We are a college of design, what kind of design do we do?
transcript: 诶我们是个设计学院，我们做什么样的设计？

translation: In fact, back in 2009, Tongji University decided to take the entire Department of Art and Design out of the original College of Architecture and Urban Planning.
transcript: 实际上在2009年的时候，同济大学决定把整个艺术设计系，从原来的建筑城规学院里面拿出来。

translation: And set up an independent new college.
transcript: 成立一个全新的学院。

translation: At that time we organized an extensive two-day workshop.
transcript: 那个时候我们做了两天的密集工作访。

translation: Inviting the world’s best design educators, design researchers, President of World Industrial Design Association and representatives from relevant professional organizations to carefully consider this question.
transcript: 请了全世界最好的设计教育家，那包括那个设计研究者，那包括就说是当时世界工业设计协会的主席等等，那这些行业组织，一起来思考。

translation: “If Shanghai has to set up such a design institute, what should it be like?”
transcript: 如果在上海要办一所学校，那它应该是什么样的？

translation: We agreed on a general direction that this new college should focus on design-driven innovation and teach students with knowledge that would stimulate innovation.
transcript: 所以我们定下来的一个大的一个方向就说，哎，这所学校，应该我们关注的是设计驱动的创新，而我们要教的设计是驱动创新的设计。

translation: It is interesting to see how this college grows, but the fun part is that this college is constantly creating something new.
transcript: 所以现在再来去看这所学校的话，那非常有意思，但，应该说是不停地这个学院在创造一些新的事物。

translation: You have already seen the Sino-Finnish Center, which was set up in 2010.
transcript: 比如刚才大家看到是中芬中心，2010年的时候那个建立的。

translation: And by 2011 this center and D. School of Stanford University were praised by the Monocle Magazine as the world's most innovative platforms for higher education.
transcript: 那11年的时候Monocle杂志就把它和斯坦福大学D.School一起报道为世界上最创新的高等教育平台。

translation: All our students, without exception, are required to learn open-source hardware and programming in the first semester of their freshman year.
transcript: 我们这个学院的学生，百分之一百的学生，从一年级进来之后，第一学期开始，都必须要学开源硬件与编程。

translation: In other words, all our students, without exception, are ready to enter the Bit World.
transcript: 那也就是说，这个学院的学生，百分之一百他已经开始了进入了比特的这个世界。

translation: Since day one of entering into our college, all our college students are exposed to a new design concept where the Atomic world and the Bit World are flawlessly integrated.
transcript: 在这个学院里面，我们讲的设计是怎么把原子的世界和比特的世界，在一进大学的时候就能够把它整合在一起。

translation: Apart from this technical aspect, our students are required to keep a close eye on social issues.
transcript: 除了这个技术的及这个面向，这个学院的学生还大量地去关注社会问题。

translation: For example, I created a project called DesignHarvests, in 2007.
transcript: 那比如说这个是我在2007年的时候，创立一个项目，设计丰收。

translation: It was a valuable learning experience for my students in taking part in the project.
transcript: 那我们的学生那在学习的过程当中，他们直接去面对一些大的挑战。

translation: In addition, they were required to face some major challenges, such as the sustainable development of rural China.
transcript: 比如说，中国的乡村的可持续发展问题。

translation: You might have noticed that there is an ongoing exhibition, somewhere near the Tongji Pavilion, and it is an exhibition organized by our students.
transcript: 呃在我们附近的这个展览，啊就在同济馆边上，大家可能看到有一个，我们学生的一个展览。

translation: Actually they are our last year’s students.
transcript: 那实际上这是我们去年的学生。

translation: The exhibition features their design works with a theme of saving and protecting rhino.
transcript: 呃那个通过设计来去拯救和保护犀牛这么一个物种。

translation: So you can tell that, besides the technical aspect, our college also values highly of social care and humanistic care.
transcript: 所以可以看到，诶你会发现不仅仅在技术这个层面，同时呢，诶我们有非常深切的一个社会关怀和人文关怀。

translation: And more importantly.
transcript: 但是更重要的是什么呢？

translation: We are looking for a new way of education.
transcript: 就是说，诶我们在寻求一种全新的一种教育方式。

translation: For example, this is the front gate of our Fab Lab.
transcript: 那比如说这是我们fab lab的门口。

translation: You can see that whenever there is a lecture or seminar, all passing-by students are welcomed to stop and listen.
transcript: 啊那个大家可以看到，当有分享的时候，有讲座的时候，路过的学生他都可以停下来听。

translation: There isn’t any teacher doing the roll-call, and our teachers won’t tell you that “you can only leave after having listened to my lecture; it is a way of you showing respect to me.”
transcript: 没有老师在那儿点名，也没有老师说，诶你必须要那个听完我的讲座，这是对我的尊敬。

translation: Not at all, you can sit down if you like.
transcript: 没有，大家喜欢就坐下来。

translation: Or you simply walk away if the topic is unattractive to you.
transcript: 诶如果觉得不感兴趣了，诶，可以随时随地去走。

translation: It reminds me of the Confucius’s way of teaching.
transcript: 那这不由让我想起了当时孔夫子的教育。

translation: The Confucius had a great vision for the entire world.
transcript: 啊孔夫子他是怀揣着一个，对世界的一个愿景。

translation: He and many of his disciples travelled through all the kingdoms.
transcript: 然后呢，诶在这个过程当中呢，他带着很多的弟子，啊那个呃周游列国。

translation: The purpose of the travelling was to promote Confucius’s thoughts.
transcript: 那周游列国的目的实际上是用来推广他的思想。

translation: He would begin his class under a tree, and he didn’t have any so called advanced teaching equipment at all.
transcript: 碰到一棵树，诶他可以坐下来，开始就上课了，也没有到现在我们所谓的这么先进的教学设备。

translation: Of course he didn’t have any textbook.
transcript: 啊当然他也没有教材。

translation: The Analects of Confucius, a collection of Confucius’ verbal expressions, was entirely compiled by his disciples.
transcript: 啊孔夫子到现在为止，啊留下来的《论语》啊都是他的口头的思那个传播他的思想的一些记录，都是由他弟子来完成的。

translation: If Confucius had to undergo modern professional title appraisal.
transcript: 啊如果孔子到现在来评职称的话。

translation: I’m afraid it’s likely he would barely make the mark as a lecturer.
transcript: 那可能他连讲师都评评不上。

translation: Besides our students, our college values highly of the sense of community.
transcript: 那么对于学院来讲的话，除了我们自己的学生之外，啊特别特别重要的就说这个社群。

translation: Our college has organized many activities.
transcript: 那像这个学院里面有非常多的活动，那经常会在学院里面发生。

translation: As the dean of this college, I know little about what’s going on, as these activities are entirely run by our teachers.
transcript: 作为院长我根本不知道发生了什么事情，因为我们的都是我们的老师们在那个推动。

translation: And gradually we have formed a unique culture.
transcript: 慢慢慢慢它已经变成了一种文化。

translation: Our Fab Lab is made open to the public, and we start organizing open-day events during weekends.
transcript: 比如说这是我们fab lab的开放，那个那个那个那个周末的时候的一个开放活动。

translation: As a result, residents from the nearby communities gather together under the eaves of our college, and learn all kind of hardware related knowledge.
transcript: 那周边的这个社区的居民，诶一起聚在我们学院的屋檐下面来学习，啊各种各样的那个硬件知识。

translation: Our college also becomes the playground for many children.
transcript: 啊整个一个学院经常我们会有很多小朋友在那儿玩。

translation: From 2015, our college started deepening cooperation with Siping Community.
transcript: 那从2015年的时候呢，我们逐渐地开始呢就说和那个四平社区呢加深了一个合作。

translation: By making full use the knowledge spillover effect of our college, we want to slowly improve the community.
transcript: 啊通过那个学院的一个知识溢出呢，一点一点地在改变这个社区。

translation: You know we now have a large number of on-going projects.
transcript: 大家可以看到，就说有大量的那个就是那个呃项目啊在在推进。

translation: For example, our college used to have a Glass Lab, and later it was moved to a new location within the Siping Community.
transcript: 比如说是我们把那个学院的玻璃实验室，从学院搬到了那个社区里面。

translation: We even invited Shanghai Glass Museum to take part in this joint project.
transcript: 那由和上海玻璃博物馆来一起来合作呢。

translation: We end up building a community-based Glass Workshop.
transcript: 做了一个位于社区的一个玻璃工坊。

translation: This is a Media Lab jointly developed with MIT, whose predecessor was a garbage station of Siping Street.
transcript: 那这个呢是我们和麻省理工学院的媒体实验室，它的前身呢是我们四平街道的一个垃圾站。

translation: We later transformed it into a world-class science lab.
transcript: 然后呢我们把它呢通过改造变成了一个，那世界顶尖的一个科学实验室。

translation: We believe that in the future a community will have important intellectual resources.
transcript: 我们认为，啊这个未来的，非常重要的智力资源在社区里面。

translation: The demands are generated within the community, and people who are able to address these demands live in the community.
transcript: 需求在社区里面，然后呢解决这些问题的人在社区里面。

translation: To us, a community is actually an extension of a university.
transcript: 那所以呢对我们来讲，社区实际上就是一个大学的一个延伸。

translation: In an effort to better interact with the nearby communities, we have applied the use of many technologies, including data technology.
transcript: 当然为了更好地和社区互动，大家可以看到，啊我们可能会用一些技术，比如说数据的技术。

translation: We have installed a lot of probes and cameras within our labs and streets within the community.
transcript: 啊现在在我们的那个实验室里面啊，包括在我们的社区的那个街道里面，啊实际上我们用了大量的那个，装了大量的那个，就说探头和摄像机。

translation: Why do we need to do this?
transcript: 啊为什么要这样做呢？

translation: It is necessary to do so. We can obtain direct feedback on every change we have made to the community through data collection.
transcript: 因为我们在对社区的每一个改动，那实际上你通过数据的收集。

translation: And the information will be used as a useful reference to influence the community for the next time.
transcript: 你都可以得到真实的一个反馈，来为我们进一步的社区干涉来去做准备和做依据。

translation: From this point of view, the whole community becomes a future-oriented laboratory; while a university becomes an open maker space.
transcript: 所以在这个意义上来讲的话呢，整个一个社区，它就变成了一个面向未来的一个实验室，然后大学呢，就变成了一个开放众创的一个空间。

translation: This is the Sino-Finnish Center.
transcript: 这是我们现在在中芬中心。

translation: We are opening an inter-disciplinary program, and all students are from different academic background.
transcript: 我们那个开的跨学科课程，所有的学生都来自于不同的专业。

translation: You can see how they interact with each other at this program.
transcript: 他们的这个工作的场景，大家可以看到。

translation: It is fascinating, isn’t it?
transcript: 啊非常有意思，是吧？

translation: Take a look at this new community-based project.
transcript: 那这是在那个社区里面的那个，就是那个我们最近的一个项目。

translation: We call it the Prototype Street.
transcript: 就说是原型街。

translation: After we have obtained the maker space in the community, we introduce this lab.
transcript: 我们把那个社区的那个空间拿下来之后呢，把实验室呢推出去。

translation: You'll find that the boundary between a community and a university now becomes blurry.
transcript: 那最后呢你会发现就是说我们把社区和大学之间的这么一个边界呢就模糊了。

translation: Of course in this Prototype Street, we mainly think about our lives in the future.
transcript: 当然在这条原型街里面，我们更多的是考虑未来是怎么来生活的。

translation: We then turn different strategies into a business prototype.
transcript: 然后呢各种各样的策略呢，我们都把它呢做成原型。

translation: Once meeting with capital investment, the prototype can directly result in a company.
transcript: 然后这个原型一旦和资本能够相遇的话呢，它就可以直接产生公司。

translation: At the same time, the online and offline modules are connected.
transcript: 同时呢，这个线上和线下是连在一起的，啊。

translation: A higher education institution can do many interesting things.
transcript: 那么大学在做很多很有意思的事情。

translation: When talking about the education of design, you might find out that a middle school is less interesting than a university.
transcript: 但是呢那个一回到那个我们的呃设计教育的前沿，啊你会发现呢，诶中学远远没有大学有意思。

translation: This is a classic picture of high school students doing their assignments, and the reality might be even worse.
transcript: 啊，那个这个是一张很典型的一个，高中生刷题的一个一个照片，是吧，事实状况可能会更差。

translation: I have been thinking of this question for a long time.
transcript: 但是呢那个我一直在想。

translation: Is it possible to have a brand new mindset and create a new education possibility?
transcript: 有没有可能呢就说去换一种思维，那有没有可能去提供一种教育的新的可能性？

translation: The existing mainstream education model has played a significant role in improving the quality of Chinese people.
transcript: 现在的这个中国的主流教育模式，对整个民族的素质提高，应该是起了不可磨灭的作用。

translation: However, there are some students who are unable to benefit from this mainstream education system.
transcript: 诶但是呢，还是有一群孩子，他可能没有在这个体系下面。

translation: Within this system, you’re required to be exactly the same with your peers, as the definition of excellence is set the same.
transcript: 因为现在这个体系，基本上是希望大家都变成一样的，对优秀的定义可能也都是一样的。

translation: As the saying goes, thousands of troops are crossing a single-log bridge.
transcript: 我们常说的一句话，就是千军万马去过独木桥。

translation: I first had an idea of setting up a new middle school back in 2015.
transcript: 所以差不多在2015年的时候呢，我就开始呢在琢磨呢，有没有可能呢去办一所新的学校。

translation: Firstly it was just an idea, then I even wrote a proposal, but didn’t find a chance to make it come true.
transcript: 那这个学校一开始是有个想法，我现在做了一个proposal，做了一个提案，事实上是并没有具体的一个落地的一个一个机会。

translation: With this proposal on our hands, we kept looking for a chance to build this kind of new school.
transcript: 然后呢拿了这个提案呢，我们到处去找落地的这个机会。

translation: And interesting enough, finally Huangpu District accepted our idea.
transcript: 那最后呢非常有意思呢就是说我们黄浦区，那接受了这么一个想法。

translation: In June 2016, director of Education Bureau of Huangpu District and me signed a cooperation agreement, and this middle school was therefore named Tongji-Huangpu School of Design and Innovation.
transcript: 2016年的时候呢，6月份的时候呢，黄浦区那个教育局局长呢和我呢，一起签了一个合作协议，所以呢我们这一所中学就叫同济黄埔设计创意中学。

translation: The school has an ideal location, somewhere near the Bund of Shanghai.
transcript: 这个地段非常好，在上海的外滩。

translation: The school’s predecessor is Puguang Middle School and Chinese YMCA Secondary School at the very beginning.
transcript: 那原来是前身是浦光中学，再往前呢是基督教青年会中学。

translation: Ieoh Ming Pei, Run Run Shaw and Chen Yifei all graduated from this school.
transcript: 呃呃，贝聿铭先生、邵逸夫先生、陈逸飞先生都是从这所中学毕业的，啊。

translation: Apart from its ideal location, what's interesting is that the school has a very innovative education model.
transcript: 但是呢就说比这个地段更加好的，意思有意思的地方，更加创新的地方，是它的一个教育模式。

translation: Our conventional education model is subject-based, in other words, we teach subject-based knowledge to students, including mathematics, Chinese, geography, chemistry, history and biology etc.
transcript: 我们传统的教育呢，基本上都是基于科目的，也就说我们把知识呢切分成各个类目，数学、语文、地理、化学、历史、生物。

translation: There isn’t much crossover among different subjects, or even these subjects compete against each other.
transcript: 那么知识和知识之间呢实际上并没有太多的这个交叉，甚至呢它们还有竞争。

translation: When we were students at that time, our doggerel was—Math, physics and chemistry are the strongest power to the world.
transcript: 啊我们读书的时候，那基本上大家的顺口溜是：学好数理化，走遍天下都不怕。

translation: But nowadays young kids might say that “Those who have mastered Chinese language can rule the world.”
transcript: 那到现在来讲的话，诶现在小孩可能会说，诶得语文者得天下。

translation: With the advance of the times, we will find out that the focus is different.
transcript: 啊所以随着时代的那个推进，大家会发现呢就是说，诶重点会不一样。

translation: But there is something more interesting.
transcript: 但是呢比较有意思的是啥呢？

translation: Our world is not decided by any subject-specific knowledge.
transcript: 就是说我们所面对的这个世界，它恰恰不是由科目来决定的。

translation: Our school therefore has a very different education model.
transcript: 所以在这所学校呢，它的一个模式非常不一样。

translation: The subject-based programs only account for 60% of our curriculum design, and we will do something else with the remaining 40% of the curriculum design.
transcript: 也就说我们把基于科目的这个课程，我们把它压缩到了60%，然后腾出40%的时间我们来做什么呢？

translation: We will have a question-based education.
transcript: 我们是来做基于问题的教育。

translation: In other words, students won’t be asked to deal with any abstract proposition related to Chinese, mathematics, chemistry and physics.
transcript: 也就说，学生碰到的不是语文、数学、化学、物理，这样的一个抽象的一个命题。

translation: Instead they will be asked to deal with a very specific proposition, such as river pollution at the Suzhou River.
transcript: 他可能碰到的是一个很具体的，比如说水污染问题，啊边上就是苏州河，苏州河污染的问题。

translation: This proposition, in fact, is a combination of different issues in the fields of history, chemistry, physics and mathematics.
transcript: 那这个问题里面，事实上它是有历史的问题，有化学的问题，有物理的问题，有数学的问题。

translation: And the key is how we have designed the angel of this proposition.
transcript: 关键就看我们怎么把这个问题藏在里面。

translation: So in this school, 40% of the programs are question-based, and we want to cultivate students’ knowledge application abilities to deal with cross-situational problems.
transcript: 那么在这所学校，这个40%的课程我们都称之为，啊那个基于问题的课程，然后呢我们所培养的训练的是跨情境应用知识能力。

translation: I had an in-depth dialogue with teachers from this middle school last semester, expressing my high hope for this question-based program.
transcript: 上个学期我和中学的老师做了一次比较深度的一个对谈，啊我是希望呢能够大家知道这个40%的基于问题的这个课程。

translation: I told them that it was not mysterious at all, but a collection of application questions.
transcript: 实际上没有那么神秘，那我说实际上它就是应用题的一个集合。

translation: Students were required to apply inter-disciplinary knowledge to solve one problem.
transcript: 啊就是把各种各样的知识在一个问题里面我们把它串起来。

translation: As of now, 40% of this question-based PPL program has been taught by teachers from our college, and the rest are taught by middle school teachers.
transcript: 目前来讲的话，这个40%的基于问题的PPL的啊这么那个教学呢是由我们学院来承担的，那60%的基于科目的呢是由中学来学承担的。

translation: We have reached a tacit agreement with the middle school, hoping that more and more middle-school teachers will be able to teach this question-based program in the future.
transcript: 那么我们和这个中学呢达成了一个默契，也就说我们希望呢中学会有越来越多的老师能够去承担这个40%的基于问题的这个知识。

translation: At this middle school, we want to cultivate students’ innovation ability, self-care ability of daily living, the ability to handle a research project, the ability to apply scientific knowledge, leadership and self-learning ability.
transcript: 那在这所学校里面呢，我们培养的是创新的能力，生活的能力，项目的能力，科学过程的能力，应用能力，领导力和自我学习能力。

translation: We hope that graduates from this middle school will have the consciousness of innovation and the design thinking;
transcript: 我们希望这所中学培养出来学生，他是具有创新意识的。

translation: However, we don’t wish that all of these students continue their studies on design.
transcript: 他是具有设计思维的，但是呢我们并不希望这些学生，他以后来去都去读那个设计。

translation: The future of these students shouldn’t be limited to becoming a designer.
transcript: 啊我们不希望这些学生以后把他们的未来，设在我要去成为设计师。

translation: They should become the re-definers of the rules of the game in every sector of our society in the future.
transcript: 他应该成为未来的各个领域里面的游戏规则的重新定义者。

translation: As for the running of this school, we hope that it will be made open to the communities.
transcript: 那么对这个学校来讲的话，我们希望它向整个社区打开。

translation: And in return, the communities will constantly provide resources to the school.
transcript: 同时呢社区也会向这个学校，提供源源不断的这个资源。

translation: Anyone who is familiar with me might know that I have spent a considerable time on design-driven urban-rural interaction.
transcript: 大家可能也知道，就说，那熟悉我的人知道，我做了很长时间的那个呃设计驱动的城乡交互。

translation: 10 years ago, actually 11 years ago, I did a project called DesignHarvests.
transcript: 啊嘶十年前，那十一年前，我做了一个项目叫设计丰收。

translation: We tried to incorporate some of our ideas, including the concept of urban agriculture, into this project.
transcript: 那实际上就说我们也把那个一些想法，比如说是农业都市农业的想法把它引到了这个项目里面。

translation: We are doing the same when running this school.
transcript: 所以我们希望在这个学校里面。

translation: Our students will learn how to grow vegetables and how to raise fish in the school.
transcript: 我们的孩子们是能够在这个学校里面能够种菜，能够养鱼。

translation: As I have mentioned before, the open-source hardware and software system are linked together.
transcript: 而且呢这个系统是被我刚才所说的，这个开源硬件和软件系统呢是连在一起的。

translation: Therefore a student can monitor the growing condition of the vegetables or the fish through a Pad or a cell phone.
transcript: 所以他可以通过一个Pad或者一个手机来去对他自己养的这个菜，啊养的鱼，种的菜呢进行那个就说是那个调试。

translation: He can even adjust the intensity of artificial sunlight, the humidity level and irrigation system.
transcript: 可以调整太阳的那个呃人工人工阳光，调调调节它的湿度和水。

translation: We are now working to develop such a system.
transcript: 那么这套系统呢现在正在研发当中。

translation: This is a simple video clip of this school.
transcript: 那这是这个学校的一个简单的一个视频。

translation: You can tell that, compared to a conventional school, this school has a totally different space design.
transcript: 可以看到呢就说这个空间本身啊是跟传统概念的学校是不一样的。

translation: Our school is particularly spacious and open.
transcript: 整个空间特别特别的开敞。

translation: You know, 40% of our courses are project-based, and therefore we hope that our school can provide an environment that is good enough to support comprehensive and flexible project-based education.
transcript: 然后呢因为我们的40%的课程呢是项目制的，所以整个空间我们希望呢，能够提供各种各样的，能够支持灵活的项目制教育的这么一个环境。

translation: Of course the idea is great, but it is not easy to transform the idea into concrete action.
transcript: 那当然这个想法是非常好啊，但是一点一点落地在这个过程当中其实还是不是那么容易的。

translation: We signed the agreement in 2016, but only started enrolling students in 2017.
transcript: 我们2016年签约，2017年这个学校向全社会招生。

translation: This is an enrollment advertisement that was posted at the Union Church of the Bund in April this year.
transcript: 这个是4月份的时候，我们在外滩的天安堂那个招生的广告。

translation: That was a great gathering of many people as it is today.
transcript: 啊那天也像今天一样啊济济一堂。

translation: Russell once made a speech at this church more than 100 years ago.
transcript: 啊在那个这个教堂是以前一百年前的时候，罗素在上海发表演讲的地方。

translation: And from certain point of view, it was meaningful for us to run the enrollment campaign at this church.
transcript: 那其实从某个角度来讲的话，它也有很多的寓意在里面。

translation: Of course we couldn’t bypass the senior middle school entrance examination, but we want to have an initial screening on our candidate students.
transcript: 因为我们也不能绕过中考，啊但是呢我们也希望这些孩子啊。

translation: That is why we invited candidate students to have face-to-face interviews at our college.
transcript: 我们能够进行一下那个初步的一个筛选，所以在我们学院里面呢我们进行了面试。

translation: The logic is simple.
transcript: 所以它整个一个逻辑呢。

translation: A student will only be allowed to apply for our school before passing the face-to-face interview.
transcript: 是所有的填这所学校的孩子他首先要拿到我们面试的合格的这个证书，他才能够填这个中学。

translation: The interview was very interesting.
transcript: 啊也非常有意思的是。

translation: When students arrived at the event venue and sat down, they were very nervous and had no idea of what the interview would be like.
transcript: 我们的孩子刚坐下来的时候，他非常的拘谨，啊他们不知道这个面试是怎么样的。

translation: They kept making phone calls to our teachers, “How is the interview arrangement? What kinds of books do we need to read in advance for the interview? How can we better prepare for the interview?”
transcript: 不停地打电话来问我们的老师说，哎，我们怎么来面试啊？我们要准备什么材料啊？我们要做什么样的复习啊？

translation: Our teachers told them, “You don’t need to do anything, please make sure you arrive on time.”
transcript: 诶我们老师说，不用你来了就可以了。

translation: It was a big surprise to them when they read the interview questions.
transcript: 当他们一拿到卷子的时候，一拿到考题的时候，他们非常的惊讶。

translation: Why?
transcript: 为什么呢？

translation: The questions were.
transcript: 他们的考题是。

translation: How to work together?
transcript: 怎么一起工作？

translation: How to live together?
transcript: 怎么一起生活？

translation: How to stay old together…
transcript: 怎么一起变老？怎么一起……

translation: These were all major challenges.
transcript: 面对的这些都是都是这些挑战，都是一些大的挑战。

translation: In a very short period of time, these students opened their heart.
transcript: 然后在很短的时间里面你会发现，诶这些孩子事实上完全被打开了。

translation: Take a look at this picture, featuring how the interview was run that day, and many students appearing on this picture were later accepted and studied in our school.
transcript: 那这就是我们当时面试的过程，那其中在这个照片里面呢很多学生最后都如愿以偿地进入了这个中学。

translation: Please take a look at the girl on the right side of the picture.
transcript: 啊那个在图片右侧的这个女孩子。

translation: She was undertaking an interview. She wanted to know what the world would be like if she was a person with visual impairment.
transcript: 实际上她在测试就说，啊她在那个尝试一个眼睛有障碍的人，她看出的世界会是什么样的。

translation: That is an important element of design, we call it empathy.
transcript: 啊这是我们设计里面很重要的一个点就是叫同理心。

translation: In September 2017 the middle school officially opened.
transcript: 那在2017年9月份的时候，这个学校就顺利地就呃开幕了。

translation: The school has been put in trail operation for a year, and during this period of time, many incredible stories occurred.
transcript: 实际上这个学校测试了一年，啊期间发生了各种各样的，应该说是非常感人的故事。

translation: When we began enrolling new students this year, we decided to invite last year’s students and their parents to share their experience.
transcript: 那么今年呢我们开始在招那个新一届的学生，啊，我们决定呢就请去年入学的学生和家长来去分享他们这一年的体会。

translation: One of these student speakers was particularly interesting.
transcript: 那其中其中呢这一位同学非常有意思啊。

translation: When he first entered our school, in his teachers’ words, “he was unable to open his mouth”, that is to say, he was not able to have a normal communication with others.
transcript: 他是在进入这个中学的时候，老师形容呢说他是张不开口的，他是完全没有办法和别人交流的。

translation: But one year later, he was able to take part in a speech contest.
transcript: 但是呢，一年之后呢，他已经可以去参加演讲比赛。

translation: I don’t know whether he has won any award for the speech contest.
transcript: 我不知道最后他有没有得奖，啊。

translation: He now becomes a cheerful and outgoing person, and a transforming change does happen to him in a year.
transcript: 那个非常地外向，非常地开朗，一年之内天翻地覆的变化。

translation: His father also gave a speech on the stage, describing the major changes happening to his son last year.
transcript: 他父亲上了台，啊讲了就说，诶这个孩子在一年里面的变化。

translation: Then this student added something very interesting.
transcript: 然后呢，这个孩子很有意思说。

translation: He said, “I’m not the only one who has grown up, my father and mother are also growing up with me.”
transcript: 他说，这一年里面不仅仅我在成长，啊我的爸爸妈妈也跟着我一起在成长，啊。

translation: So in their eyes, and from them, what I see is hope, what I see is the future.
transcript: 所以在他们的呃眼里面，在他们的身上，我看到的是希望，我看到的是未来。

translation: Our students also open a WeChat public account, sharing their ideas in studying in our school.
transcript: 这些孩子们做的那个那个那个那个公众号，把他们的那个把他们的那些在这个学校学习的一些感受那通过公众号呢。

translation: It is effective in promoting the image of the school, and helps students consolidate that knowledge they have learned.
transcript: 对外传播出去，同时呢也帮助他们呢来去呃巩固那个知识。

translation: Since its very inception to now, I have found one thing that particularly touched me.
transcript: 所以我觉得很有意思的是这件事情啊，从一开始创造到现在，啊一年里面，啊我觉得真正呃得到那个让我感动的是什么呢？

translation: That is, this school has become a focus of public attention.
transcript: 就说，这得到了一个全社会的一个关注。

translation: For example, till now Huangpu District has already had three party secretaries.
transcript: 比如说黄浦区到现在那实际上已经换了三任区委书记了。

translation: And no of them ever asked me this question, “Professor Lou, do you have any previous middle-school-running experience?”
transcript: 没有一位问过我，娄教授，你搞过中学吗？

translation: No one has asked me this question.
transcript: 没有一个人来问我。

translation: I don’t any previous middle-school-running experience.
transcript: 我真的没有搞过。

translation: If I had been asked this question, it was unlikely that the school would become successful at all.
transcript: 啊因为如果说你问这句话，那基本上这个中学不可能办成。

translation: Many parents end up bringing their children to our school.
transcript: 然后呢这么多家长来去考这个学校，带着孩子来来去报这个学校。

translation: Some students’ enrollment decisions were made at a family meeting.
transcript: 那有些是家庭会议决定的。

translation: Some students insisted in applying for our school despite that their parents didn’t agree.
transcript: 有些是家长不让报，孩子自己还是要报这个学校。

translation: Other students had been given the chance to study at a prestigious school in Shanghai, but they quit and chose our school instead.
transcript: 有些是他能够进上海的最好中学，但是他放弃了，那决定来去读这个中学。

translation: There are many of these touching stories.
transcript: 所以在这个过程当中有非常非常多的那让我自己感到感动的那个地方。

translation: We are thinking about how to connect education with games.
transcript: 我们正在思考怎么把教育和游戏连在一起。

translation: The future-oriented education must be driven by personal interest.
transcript: 一个未来的教育，它一定是基于兴趣的。

translation: I keep saying these words, “Our kids are done if they don't know how to play.”
transcript: 我常说的一句话说，如果现在的孩子再不会玩，那么他们就完了。

translation: Kids are done if they don't know how to play.
transcript: 不会玩，他就完了。

translation: So, the next thing we want to think about is how we can connect education with playing.
transcript: 啊所以接下来我们是希望来考虑的是，怎么能够把玩和教育能够连在一起。

translation: I have shared with you many personal stories related to education in today’s presentation, but what to want to tell you is this—there are needs that don’t exist in the first place.
transcript: 那我今天讲的这么多的那个案例，分享了一些我跟教育的故事啊，其实最后我想讲的呢是，其实有些需求啊，原本呢并不存在。

translation: It is likely that Shanghai don’t need such a school.
transcript: 上海可能不需要这么一所学校。

translation: But there is such a need inside everyone’s heart.
transcript: 但是呢，诶其实每个人心里面。

translation: It is only because the need hasn’t been addressed yet.
transcript: 他都有一个需求，只是没有人把它做出来。

translation: So finally when the school is made open, you soon realize that not only Shanghai but also many other places are in need of this kind of school.
transcript: 但是一旦就是有人把这个学校做出来之后，你会发现不仅仅是上海，很多地方都想要一这所学校。

translation: That is why I say that, “Some of the needs did not exist until they were created.”
transcript: 所以我说呢，有些需求原本并不存在，直到它被创造出来。

translation: This is the motto of our college.
transcript: 这是我们学院的motto啊座右铭。

translation: To learn and create for a meaningful life and a better world.
transcript: 啊，为人生的意义和世界的未来而学习和创造。

translation: Let us encourage each other in our endeavors.
transcript: 与大家共勉。

translation: Thank you.
transcript: 谢谢大家！
